name: R Programming Fundamentals
description:
The R Fundamentals workshops are a series of practical workshops taking students through the fundamental skills needed to use R. Each workshop has a series of exercises and challenges where students either write their own code or debug code that has been provided to get the desired outcome. 

During the series, students learn some of the key basic elements of R including variables, vectors, characters, factors, data frames, indexing, loading data, using functions, packages, conditionals, subsetting, lists, and matrices.

alignment.targetDescription: Institute of Coding recognition of attendance

criteria.narrative: This badge is awarded to people who attended at least five of the seven workshops in the R Fundamentals workshop series.
